name: sfpwowerscripts-createsourcepackage-task
friendlyName: Creates a new  version of  Source Package
description: Creates a new  version of  Source Package ,This task is part of DX@Scale/sfpowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com
instanceNameFormat: Creates a new version of Source Based Package for  $(package)

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package, as mentioned in sfdx-project.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the package, that is mentioned in sfdx-project.json

inputs.name: apextestsuite
inputs.label: Apex Test Suite that needs to be associated with the source package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Apex Test hat need to be associated with the package

inputs.name: destructiveManifestFilepath
inputs.label: Path to a destructiveChanges.xml
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to the xml file which contains the destructive changes, file should be named destructiveChanges.xml and should be accessible by this task

inputs.name: version_number
inputs.label: The version number of the package to be created
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format is major.minor.patch.buildnumber . This will override the build number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json, Try considering the use of Increment Version Number task before this task

inputs.name: isDiffCheck
inputs.label: Only run task if package has changed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box to enable package creation only when the package has been modified

inputs.name: isGitTag
inputs.label: Tag latest commit ID with package name and version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags the latest commit with the package name and version, upon successful build

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_package_version_number
OutputVariables.description: The version number of the package that was created

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_source_package_metadata_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to the metadata artifact  created by this task

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_source_package_path
OutputVariables.description: The path to source artifact built by this task
